verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p] > [ARG0: The White House] [V: says] [ARG1: Melania Trump wo n't join her husband when he heads to the Camp David presidential retreat for the weekend.</p] >
< p > The White House says Melania Trump [V: wo] n't join her husband when he heads to the Camp David presidential retreat for the weekend.</p >
< p > The White House says [ARG0: Melania Trump] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: join] [ARG1: her husband] [ARGM-TMP: when he heads to the Camp David presidential retreat for the] weekend.</p >
< p > The White House says Melania Trump wo n't join her husband [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [V: heads] [ARG1: to the Camp David presidential retreat] [ARGM-PRP: for the] weekend.</p >
